markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hyaenodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3066)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hyaenodons are ferocious primeval creatures that resemble hyenas. Looming, shaggy-furred animals nearly the size of a horse, hyaenodons are truly formidable predators to be reckoned with, due both to their size and to their flesh-shearing jaws. Hyaenodons prey on small horses, camels, and even young rhinoceroses. Kholo clans find these creatures particularly useful as mounts and guardians.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Hyaenodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3066)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 1d10+5 piercing plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=46) and bonecrunching bite

**Bonecrunching Bite**   A creature that is critically hit by a hyaenodon must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or become [wounded 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=99) as the creature's bones or cartilage are crushed by the beast's jaws.

**Drag** <actions string="Single Action" />  The hyaenodon makes a jaws Strike against a [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88) enemy. If it hits, in addition to dealing damage, the hyaenodon Strides up to 10 feet, [dragging](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the enemy along.

**Pack Attack**   The hyaenodon deals an extra 1d6 damage to any creature within reach of at least two of the hyaenodon's allies.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-433" />
name: Hyaenodon
